text:
Carlo Delle Piane (2 February 1936 – 23 August 2019) was an Italian actor. From 1948 until his death, he appeared in more than 100 movies. He was born in Rome. In 1984, he won the Nastro d'Argento for Best Actor for his role in "Una gita scolastica". For his role in "Regalo di Natale" he won the Volpi Cup.
Delle Piane died on 23 August 2019 in Rome at the age of 83.
